page.title: 20FUTURE:BLEASBY & THURGARTON
page.content: Outside the modern but now empty office block at Thurgarton stands a large sculpture of a mammoth:the remains of one was found in the local gravels.It could be seen as a black symbol of the pessimism in aspects of life today.But the children named be- low won't consider nuclear war or such topics:they are incorrigibly optimistic about the future. {Class 3,BLEASBY SCHOOL,NOTTM}:David M. Tracy K. Louise F. Amber H. Lynn J. Caroline A. Amy C. Anthony C. Richard W. Tim S. Rachael F. Helen M. Charlotte F. Nina H. Vikki W. Claire W Jane K. Brian H. Lee B. Liam H. Natasha H. Helen J. Caroline M. Emma S Elizabeth A. Joanna C. Parents:Anne & Guy Woolley,Ann Douglass. Farmer:G Harris Teachers:Rachael Andrew & Barrie Jackson (Class/Head Teacher)
